title: Global Brands Group – Internship
description: Explored digital transformation strategies and their applications across industries

Mastered the use of SharePoint for online collaboration and content management.

title: Next Academy – InternShip
description: Gained hands-on experience in developing mobile applications using the Flutter framework.
Built foundational knowledge in creating cross-platform apps for both Android and iOS
Integrated Firebase for real-time database operations and user authentication.

title: NVIDIA – Workshop
description: Participated in a workshop on AI and deep learning technologies

title: PathLine – InternShip
description: Completed a Web Development Level III internship at PathLine Training Academy with a focus on Angular framework.
Developed a fully responsive personal portfolio website using Angular,showcasing skills,projects,and experience
Gained practical experience in Angular CLI, TypeScript, and modular design principles.

title: Angular Course – Udemy
description: successfully completed the course Angular - The Complete Guide (2025 Edition).
A hands-on deep dive into Angular’s core concepts including components, routing, forms, and services.
Learned best practices for building scalable and maintainable Angular applications.
Explored advanced topics such as state management, lazy loading, and performance optimization.

title: Angular Certification – HackerRank
description: Earned two certifications from HackerRank: Angular (Basic) and Angular (Intermediate).
Demonstrated solid understanding of Angular fundamentals including components, data binding, and directives.
Applied advanced concepts such as dependency injection, routing, observables, and reactive forms.
Validated skills in building efficient, scalable, and maintainable Angular applications.
